mapper.select:
select r.rvId, r.movId, r.userId, r.rvScore, r.rvContent, r.rvRegDate, r.rvUpdate, r.rvLike, u.userNickName
from review r join user u on r.userId = u.userId where movId = #{movId}
, m.movName from review r join user u on r.userId = u.userId join movie m on r.movId = m.movId
order by r.rvLike desc limit 3
mapper.insert: insert into review(movId, userId, rvScore, rvContent) values(#{movId}, #{userId}, #{rvScore}, #{rvContent})
mapper.select: select count(*) from reviewlike where rvId = #{rvId} and userId = #{userId}
mapper.update: update review set rvLike = rvLike + #{pmOne} where rvId = #{rvId}
mapper.delete: delete from reviewlike where rvId = #{rvId} and userId = #{userId}
